markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Contemplative](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1667)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Even the average contemplative demonstrates an intellect that far surpasses those of most other beings.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Contemplative.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Contemplative](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1667)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), thoughtsense (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Akitonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=94); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 30 feet

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +8, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +10, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Thoughtsense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The contemplative senses all non-[mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creatures at the listed range.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 32

**Resistances**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 5

**Weaknesses**
physical 2

**Atrophied** A contemplative's limbs are withered and incapable of significant physical exertion. A contemplative can't properly wield a two-handed weapon or object without dedicating its telekinetic powers to supporting the weapon, and even then, it takes a –2 penalty to Strikes with such a weapon. It also can't use its spells or fly as long as it wields a two-handed weapon or object.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +7 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 18, attack +10
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (×3), [Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-292" />
name: Contemplative
